summary:
3 sets complete with hoods, dress, gloves and boots for Greybeard, Telvanni and Temple Priest ..

these sets can be enchanted with any arcane spellcaster or the legendary spellcaster located in the Temple of Solstheim isle ..
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/legendary-robes-dragonborn-edition/][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3468581-1403098926.png[/img][/url]
[center][size=5][b][color=gray]Legendary Robes Dragonborn - the best clothes in Solstheim[/color][/b][/size][/center]
[center][youtube][/youtube][/center]


[center][color=POWDERBLUE][size=6]<-----------------(| Description |)----------------->[/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=3][b]* This mod is [color=darkgreen]Lore-Friendly[/color] and NOT using scripts files, you can install and uninstall it anytime *

adds 3 set complete with robes, gloves, boots and hoods for - Greybeard - Telvanni - Temple Priest -
the robes are separated from the hoods and you can use the circlets simultaneously
these sets of clothing are in a chest on the Temple to the isle of Solstheim and
you can enchant them at your leisure or with the Arcane Spellcasting Legendary
but to use this magical spellcaster you have to unlock the perk "extra effect"

the legendary robes by this mod have this attributes:
[color=gray]
+50 points of Armor
+150 Points of Magicka
+50% Magicka resistance
Regeneration Magicka increased by 150%[/color]

the legendary hoods, gloves and boots have:
[color=gray]
+30% Fire resistance
+30% Frost resistance
+30% Shock resistance
+30 points of Armor[/color]

you can also enchant the jewelry in the Arcane Spellcasting Legendary
for more details watch the video or images :)[/b][/size][/center]

[center][color=POWDERBLUE][size=6]<---------------(( Compatibility ))--------------->[/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=3][b]This mod should be compatible with any mods on skyrimnexus
you can safely use any mods that change textures for greybeard, telvanni and temple priest
compatible with any mods that adds new clothes for example my other mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54206/?]Legendary Robes - Skyrim Edition[/url]
[/b][/size][/center]


[center][color=POWDERBLUE][size=6]<---------------(( Requirements ))--------------->[/size][/color][/center]
[center][b][color=#4169E1]Requires Skyrim patched to version 1.9.32.0.8
and DLC "Dragonborn"[/color][/b][/center]

[center][color=POWDERBLUE][size=6]<---------------(( Installation ))--------------->[/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=3][b]Extract the contents of the zipped file into your Skyrim/folder
[color=gray]usually (steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)[/color][/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=3][b]activated Legendary_Robes dragonborn.esp in "data files" and enjoy[/b][/size][/center]

[center][color=POWDERBLUE][size=6]<------------(( Uninstallation ))------------>[/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=3][b]to uninstall uncheck Legendary_Robes Dragonborn.esp in "data files"
and delete all the files you previously copied in Data [/b][/size][/center]
